name: Devaas Kee Meenaar
description:
Devaas kee meenaar is a roguelike and fpsgame fast paced where the goal is to climb a tower and pass through challenges. Try to beat the challenge.

[CONTROLS]

  • RMB - Aim
  • LMB - Shoot
  • Middle wheel - change weapon
  • LEFT SHIFT - Dash
  • SPACE - Jump
